Graphic Design

Annual Reports & Magazines

Annual Reports do not need to look dull and boring. Admittedly, they might not contain the most exciting content, however, with some creative use of quality photography and the design of eye-catching infographics and diagrams these reports can stand out and attract the readers attention to something they might usually pass by. If you are going to spend the time and effort putting together an annual report - wouldn't it be nice to think it will ultimately be read?

Athletics New Zealand - Annual Report

Brochures & Booklets

Brochures and booklets serve advertising purposes and since they are usually small (just a few pages) they need to look good and be informative in order to focus users' attention and effectively convey the message. However, few brochures are really designed with close attention to detail. There are a number of options to create very attractive and appealing pieces, including specialised printing techniques or unorthodox shapes using custom cutting forms and embossing blocks. The possibilities are endless.


Drug Free Sport NZ

Pope Watering Systems

Vehicle Signage

Eye-catching vehicle graphics are a highly effective and cost efficient form of advertising. It's your own mobile billboard seen by hundreds of people everyday. From modest side panel graphics to full vehicle wraps its easy to stand out in the crowd. Using the latest application techniques and materials which will not damage your vehicle it presents a very affordable advertising and marketing option.

Saddlery Warehouse

Pitney Bowes NZ Ltd

Banners & Posters

Banners are a great resource for any business or organisation wishing to showcase products or services at a trade show or conference. They are also very effective at attracting attention outside a business, a shop premise or point-of-sale situation. Great design plays an important role when it comes to conveying your message and banners should be treated like any other part of your marketing strategy to return the best value for your marketing dollar.

FreemanX Experiences
